mapper.select: select supplier_id, supplier_name, address, district_zip, province_zip, city_zip, contacts_phone_number, contacts, contacts_address, supplier_rate, supplier_status, sell_type_id, record_employee_code, record_employee_name, contacts_code, edit_employee_code, edit_employee_name, edit_date from supplier where supplier_id = #{supplier_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
